import React, { Fragment } from "react"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import Leftnav from '../components/Leftnav'; import Appfooter from '../components/Appfooter'; import Popupchat from '../components/Popupchat'; import { useCookies, useContext } from "react-cookie"; import LoginComponent from "../components/LoginComponent"; import ProfileRecommender from "../components/ProfileRecommender"; import { ApiContext } from '../context/ApiContext' const Settings = (props) => { const [cookies, setCookie, removeCookie] = useCookies(["current-token"]); const { profile} = useContext( ApiContext, ); return (
{!cookies["current-token"] ?
: <> } {!profile.id ?
: <> }
